title: Trend Micro Vulnerability Protection Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Trend Micro Vulnerability Protection. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Vulnerability Protection console. The issue results from the lack of proper validation prior to authentication. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000252039
timeline:
2020-07-02 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-08-27 - Coordinated public release of advisory
